capability.name: Credit Risk Operations
capability.definition: This Service Domain monitors counterparty credit limits in the trading unit
capability.role: This Service Domain monitors the counterparty credit limits (CCL) used to govern trading activity to manage credit exposure. Note there may be regulatory requirements that determine allowed CCLs.
capability.example: A trading desk checks a proposed trade against trading counterparty credit limits

key_features.name: Establish counterparty trading credit limits
key_features.description: Enables establish counterparty trading credit limits to support this service domain monitors counterparty credit limits in the trading unit

key_features.name: Monitor limits and raise alerts against limit breaches
key_features.description: Enables monitor limits and raise alerts against limit breaches to support this service domain monitors counterparty credit limits in the trading unit
